## Grouped Bar Chart Panel Plugin for Grafana

grouped bar chart (stacked or side by side, horizontal or vertical)

## Screenshots
### chart

![gif](https://github.com/CopperHill-Consulting/grafana-groupedbarchart-panel/raw/master/src/img/0xrDREJY9o.gif)
![chart](https://github.com/CopperHill-Consulting/grafana-groupedbarchart-panel/raw/master/src/img/groupedbarchart.png)

### metrics

showing information about sub-groups( second column ) of the main categories ( first column )

![metrics](https://github.com/CopperHill-Consulting/grafana-groupedbarchart-panel/raw/master/src/img/groupedbarchart-metrics.png)

### options

![options](https://github.com/CopperHill-Consulting/grafana-groupedbarchart-panel/raw/master/src/img/groupedbarchart-options-n.png)

### colors

![colors](https://github.com/CopperHill-Consulting/grafana-groupedbarchart-panel/raw/master/src/img/groupedbarchart-colors.png)

## Installation

clone this repository into your plugin directory

```
git clone https://github.com/CopperHill-Consulting/grafana-groupedbarchart-panel.git
sudo service grafana-server restart
```
